_comment: Attribute definitions help guide the LLM in understanding what each attribute represents
_instructions: Keys should be prefixed with 'attr_' followed by the attribute name (matching your schema)
attr_Coffee_Variety: The specific variety or species of coffee bean (e.g., Arabica, Robusta, Geisha)
attr_Processing_Method: The method used to process coffee cherries into green beans (e.g., Washed, Natural, Honey, Anaerobic)
attr_Origin_Country: Country where the coffee was grown and harvested
attr_Quality_Grade: Commercial or specialty quality grade assigned to the coffee (e.g., Grade 1, Specialty Grade, Cup Score)
attr_Screen_Size: The size classification of green coffee beans based on screen mesh (e.g., Screen 15, Screen 16)
attr_Farm_Estate: Designation of farm or production source (e.g., Single Origin, Single Estate, Micro Lot)
attr_Physical_Form: The physical form of the finished product (e.g., Whole Bean, Ground, Instant, Capsule)
attr_Roast_Level: The degree of roasting applied to the coffee beans (e.g., Light, Medium, Dark, Espresso)
attr_Packaging_Type: Type of packaging used for the product (e.g., Bag, Can, Jar, Box)
attr_Origin_Country_Generic: Country of origin or production for any commodity
attr_Physical_Form_Generic: Form of the product such as whole, crushed, ground, paste, extract
attr_Quality_Grade_Generic: Commercial or trade quality grade (e.g., Grade A, Premium, FAQ)
attr_Density: Bulk or true density of the product (g/cm³, kg/m³, G/L)
attr_Processing_Method_Generic: Processing treatment applied (dried, frozen, roasted, sterilized)
attr_Size: Physical size or particle dimension (e.g., 5-7 cm pods)
attr_Mesh_Size: Mesh number if sieved or powdered (e.g., 40 mesh)
attr_Variety: Specific variety or cultivar of the product
attr_Packaging_Type_Generic: Packaging type (e.g., PP bag, carton, container, vacuum pack)
attr_Color: Color description or standardized value (e.g., bright red, ASTA color)
attr_Organic: Boolean or flag for organic certification
attr_Product_Type: Broad classification such as spice, herb, extract, oil
_usage_note: Add attribute definitions specific to your domain. These definitions are included in prompts to guide LLM classification.
